members.name: Stephanie Hickman '19
members.description: Stephanie served as our first Culture Chair. She hosted the first social events for club members and helped outline the role for future Chairs.

members.name: Cristobal Gonzalez '20
members.description: CristobalÂ lead the team that organized the first YCS Prize, for best software project submitted by Yale students.

members.name: Nishitha Burman '20
members.description: Nishitha was the first dedicated writer of our Newsletter and one of the first members of our community team.

members.name: Lasya Sreepada '19
members.description: Lasya lead the team that organized the very first YCS Gala. She worked under a strict deadline to figure out logistics for the event and delegate work to her team.

members.name: Emmett Chen-Ran '20
members.description: Emmett was one of our first community directors.

members.name: Christopher Kim '19
members.description: Christopher lead our first team dedicated to establishing partnerships with companies and reaching out to Yale alumni. He helped secure money for the first YCS Prize.

members.name: Marilyn Mossien '20
members.description: Marilyn was one of the first first years to join the club. She played a fundamental role in the logistics of hosting the first Tech Gala.

members.name: Will Kortum, '19
members.description: Will designed posters and online banners for our first events.

members.name: Rishab Ramanathan '19
members.description: Rishab was part of the Talks team, and helped invite and host speakers.

members.name: Devon Merlette, '19
members.description: Devon designed posters and online banners for our first events.

members.name: Wissem Gamra '18
members.description: Wissem served as our first Treasurer. He helped the club navigate the school bureocracy required to establish an organization, applying for grants to host events etc.

members.name: Brian Kitano '19
members.description: Brian was one of our very first members, and helped conceptualize the beginnings of the club.

members.name: Sabrina Evans '19
members.description: Sabrina was one of the first members of YCS. She was the first author of our weekly newsletters. She also established partnerships with tech organizations in New Haven.
